blog.name: scifitalk
blog.title: Sci-Fi Talk
blog.description: I post News, Podcasts and videos from my blog

title: PODCAST: Time Capsule Episode 350
body:
PODCAST: Time Capsule Episode 350

Interviews from Captain Marvel supplied by Marvel Studios plus Ann Hornaday of The Washington Post talks about her review of the movie. Actor Carlos Ponce talks reading Harry Potter in spanish for Audible who provided his comments. Closing things out are Justin Min who is Ben in the Umbrella Academy and Liam James who is Billy in SyFy’s Deadly Class.

LISTEN HERE

View On WordPress

summary: The Vanishing - SpuffyCarrie - Harry Potter - J. K. Rowling [Archive of Our Own]
title: The Vanishing - SpuffyCarrie - Harry Potter - J. K. Rowling [Archive of Our Own]
excerpt: An Archive of Our Own, a project of the Organization for Transformative Works
description:
Chapters: 11/?
Fandom: Harry Potter - J. K. Rowling
Rating: Explicit
Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings
Relationships: Hermione Granger/Draco Malfoy
Characters: Hermione Granger, Draco Malfoy, Harry Potter, Ron Weasley, Ginny Weasley, Other Character Tags to Be Added, Blaise Zabini, Bellatrix Black Lestrange, Lucius Malfoy, Voldemort (Harry Potter), Narcissa Black Malfoy, Minerva McGonagall, Rubeus Hagrid, Severus Snape, Luna Lovegood
Additional Tags: Sexual Tension, Sexual Content, Drama & Romance, Erotica, Humor, Emotional Hurt/Comfort, Sexual Fantasy, Masturbation, POV First Person, First Time, Loss of Virginity, Alternate Universe - Canon Divergence, Mutual Pining, Secret Relationship, Break Up, Getting Back Together, Minor Character Death, Canon Related, Book 5: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix, Book 6: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince

Chapter 11

“Tentatively I pull back the divider to find Draco’s grey eyes on mine, glinting in the moonlight.

He smirks but his reddened eyes give away his true emotions.

“So, my guard dog wouldn’t allow you entry?” He utters, clearly showing a bravado he doesn’t feel as his lower lip wobbles momentarily, then he exhibits a mask of calm.”

As always, the hugest thanks to @bwjdramione-blog, my wonderful beta! <3

summary:
Sometimes it's funny how insulting people get, when you say you don't like something they like.
I told two dude from my class,...
body:
Sometimes it’s funny how insulting people get, when you say you don’t like something they like.

I told two dude from my class, that I think football (soccer) is boring af and they go:

“You don’t know anything about it!”

And

“Harry Potter is boring!”

Yeah, whatever I still think football is boring.

reblog.comment:

summary: Ok but how do the House Elves even function? I mean, it’s pretty much canon that they’ll get freed if you give them a piece of...
body:
Ok but how do the House Elves even function? I mean, it’s pretty much canon that they’ll get freed if you give them a piece of clothing. Your intent, the owner of the piece of clothing in question, and whether or not the transfer of the cloth was direct does not matter (Lucius Malfoy lost Dobby by giving him a book with a pair of Harry’s Socks, even though he certainly had no intention of freeing Dobby). 

And clearly, putting clothes around so the House Elves might find them also works (Book no. 4). So like… how do they do the laundry. Do the Wizards do that themselves at fear of losing an Elf?

summary: For f*ck sake, Harry Potter is his own man. He looks like his father did, he has his mothers’ eyes but he is neither James nor...
body: For f*ck sake, Harry Potter is his own man. He looks like his father did, he has his mothers’ eyes but he is neither James nor Lily. I can’t stand the constant comparing him to his parents’ characters. We are all unique

blog.name: struruso
blog.title: Struruso
blog.description:
"welcome to my world"

Dispettoso, Tagliente, Pungente, Sfolgorante, Frizzante, Graffiante, Divertente, Piccante, Provocante.. condito il "tutto" con un pizzico di ironia e simpatia.. in una sola parola: "STRURUSO"

Sono siciliano ma ormai da anni "girovago" per l'Italia..

Non dimentico mai le mie origini e porto dentro di me il calore della mia terra.. Una "terra" che profuma di sole, di zagara e d'amore.. Una "terra" spesso abbandonata al suo destino e bagnata dal sangue di uomini onesti e coraggiosi.. Amo fotografare e sogno spesso ad occhi aperti.. Sono me stesso, sempre e comunque.. Sono il piacere di vivere un sorriso..

Sono Uno, Nessuno e Centomila..

"welcome to my world"

blog.name: bitingdownpromo
blog.title: Biting Down
blog.description: The year is 2027. The wizarding community is tearing itself apart as danger lurks around every corner; the possibility of a wizarding epidemic sends the community into a frenzy that brings a new evil to power. Will you fight for what you believe, or take the path of least resistance?

summary:
the electronics of your heart...
 The year is 2028. After an incendiary article from Rita Skeeter reporting an increase in...
caption:
the electronics of your heart…

The year is 2028. After an incendiary article from Rita Skeeter reporting an increase in squib births, the wizarding world is tossed into chaos concerning the loss of magical heritage. The renegades vow to protect what’s left of magical blood without caring about the damage along the way. More and more wixen go missing, including the Weasleys’ own Dominique. The Ministry fights within itself as Percy Weasley and Hermione Granger battle for the position of Minister of Magic, tearing the fabric holding wizarding society together.

see how fast they fall apart…

Will you fight for what you believe, or take the path of least resistance? Whether you flee or bite down and take the heat, the next great war is coming and the outcome is up to you. Welcome to Biting Down.

home | plot | rules | wanted connections | character suggestions | application

Our roleplay currently has many canon characters available, such as Victoire Weasley, Freddie Weasley, Lily Potter, Scorpius Malfoy, and both Scamander twins. We also welcome original characters, with lots of surnames available from canon!

tags: blairon is underrated so i need yall to appreciate them more
by tagging drarry so yall would notice it
summary: Ron *poke Blaise*: You know what I’ve always wondered?...How do tall people like you actually sleep at night when the blanket...
body:
Ron *poke Blaise*: You know what I’ve always wondered?…How do tall people like you actually sleep at night when the blanket can’t possibly cover you from your shoulders to your toes?

Blaise: …

Blaise: Ron, it’s 4 in the morning, go the fuck to sleep

Ron: So you can’t sleep, huh?

Ron: Is it because of the blanket?

summary:
draco: we're going on a date WE'RE GOING ON A DATE what do i do to make him like me
pansy: impress him
draco:...
body:
draco: we're going on a date WE'RE GOING ON A DATE what do i do to make him like me
pansy: impress him
draco: okay
*later*
harry: soooo... what's up?
draco: i can eat ten gallons of ice cream without dying
